articles.description: SIMON STEVENS: This is a landmark day for our country and a momentous day for the NHS as we begin the biggest vaccination campaign in our history.
articles.content:
This is a landmark day for our country and a momentous day for the NHS as we begin the biggest vaccination campaign in our history.
NHS staff have been pulling out all the stops to prepare for 'V-da… [+3763 chars]
